Instruction: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add onion and cook until softened.
Add garlic, ginger, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and cayenne pepper. Cook for 30 seconds, or until fragrant.
Stir in chickpeas, garam masala, coconut milk, and tomatoes. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
Stir in spinach and cook until wilted.
Squeeze lime juice over the curry and garnish with cilantro.
